comment:
Ginger Root was actually candied ginger.  Used twice as much as came with the recipe.  The Ginger extract is actually home juiced ginger.  1lb of ginger got us about 1/8 cup ginger.  
Actual OG was 1.07
Actual FG was 1.006
ABV 8.4
Not bad overall but barely noticeable ginger flavor and aroma.  Slight dab of mold on top just before kegging but not noticeable when drinking.
